scripts.build:compose: echo "creating docker-compose.yml and .env examples..."  && sed /build/d docker-compose.yml > build/docker-compose.yml && cp .env build/.env && tar -czvf releases/release-$(date +%F).tar.gz ./build && git add releases/release-$(date +%F).tar.gz && git commit -m 'build: release' && yarn build
scripts.build: sudo cp -r ~/db/backups/db-backup.cssow_api.latest.sql build/cssow-db/db/current && yarn --cwd src/student_web build && yarn --cwd src/markdown-service build && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web build
scripts.test: yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test && yarn --cwd src/student_web/ test && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test-api && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test-ui
